name: misty top
notes:
the misty top is a delicate, airy layer with a dreamy mesh texture that drapes beautifully, just right for the shifting days of early autumn. 
with its simple and easy design, it works up quickly, so you can make yourself a brand-new top in just one day!

what this pattern has to offer:
- made to measure - you decide how long/short or wide/narrow your top will be!
- endless possibilities for customization - it can become a shrug, crop top, shirt, tunic, or even a dress, while the two sleeve finishes add the perfect final touch
- step-by-step instructions with detailed photos at every stage of the project
- photo & video tutorials for: 
  * magic knot and changing colors with magic knot
  * foundation single crochet (fsc)
  * front post double crochet (fp dc) and back post double crochet (bp dc)


after purchase you will receive two pdf files - pattern and lookbook with details about tops made by me and my testers

materials needed:
- weight 2 yarn - i’m using yarnart ideal (50g = 170m)
- 8.0 mm and 10.0mm crochet hook
- yarn needle
- scissors
- stitch markers

this pattern is suitable for beginner / advanced beginners.

you should be familiar with the following crochet stitches:
- ch - chain
- sl st - slip stitch
- fsc - foundation single crochet
- tr - treble crochet
- dc - double crochet
- fp dc - front post double crochet
- bp dc - back post double crochet

since this is a digital product, there's no return or refund.
the reproduction or resale of this pattern, in whole or in part, is prohibited. it is intended for personal use only! you have my permission to sell items you make from my patterns as long as you please give me [@szydelkoperz] credit as the author of the patterns used.
i also ask you to sell finished items at a fair and not low price, let's value our work <3
